name: Date The Lizard!
description:
A cute, tiny dating sim for Regan from Chameleon Moon! Take a soft dragon boy on a date, coffee shop AU style! There is absolutely no fiery dystopia! The first part of this game is free, and always will be. 

Get the password for the second half (the actual date!) by joining my mailing list, or subscribing to my Patreon for lots more cool stuff!

If you have an issue playing this on mobile, go ahead and download the HTML file itself!

If you enjoyed this game and boy, why not read a book all about him and a bunch of other cool queer, trans, and disabled super-people trying to survive a dystopian, perma-burning city? My books are like this game, but longer (and with a bit more peril). Thank you!

Note: for best results, play this in the background.
